response.original_title: By Gosh It's Hot/A Day Out At Whitby
response.overview: A typical Leeds family enjoying a 1960s trip to Whitby and typical family events, including a 1970s wedding, which are given a less typical twist in being immersed in Jewish customs. But apart from the matzah ball soup and other kosher food, the kippahs and the black hats, this is just like any other family trying to hold an early television set in horizontal hold.
response.title: By Gosh It's Hot/A Day Out At Whitby
